short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block websites starting at selected dates and times.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: DateTime Website Blocker is designed to help you enjoy your favorite sporting events without unwanted spoilers. Block specific websites starting at custom dates and times to avoid accidentally seeing match results. The restrictions remain active until you decide to unblock them, ensuring a spoiler-free experience when watching events on your own schedule.
